files..claude-plugin/marketplace.json:
{
  "name": "anthropic-agent-skills",
  "owner": {
    "name": "Keith Lazuka",
    "email": "klazuka@anthropic.com"
  },
  "metadata": {
    "description": "Anthropic example skills",
    "version": "1.0.0"
  },
  "plugins": [
    {
      "name": "document-skills",
      "description": "Collection of document processing suite including Excel, Word, PowerPoint, and PDF capabilities",
      "source": "./",
      "strict": false,
      "skills": [
        "./skills/xlsx",
        "./skills/docx",
        "./skills/pptx",
        "./skills/pdf"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "example-skills",
      "description": "Collection of example skills demonstrating various capabilities including skill creation, MCP building, visual design, algorithmic art, internal communications, web testing, artifact building, Slack GIFs, and theme styling",
      "source": "./",
      "strict": false,
      "skills": [
        "./skills/algorithmic-art",
        "./skills/brand-guidelines",
        "./skills/canvas-design",
        "./skills/doc-coauthoring",
        "./skills/frontend-design",
        "./skills/internal-comms",
        "./skills/mcp-builder",
        "./skills/skill-creator",
        "./skills/slack-gif-creator",
        "./skills/theme-factory",
        "./skills/web-artifacts-builder",
        "./skills/webapp-testing"
      ]
    }
  ]
}
files.README.md: # Skills ä¸­æ–‡ç‰ˆ | Skills Chinese Edition [English](#english) | [ä¸­æ–‡](#ä¸­æ–‡) --- ## ğŸ“– å…³äºæœ¬é¡¹ç›® è¿™æ˜¯ Claude Skills æ ·ä¾‹åº“çš„**ä¸­æ–‡é€‚é…ç‰ˆæœ¬**ï¼ŒåŸºäº [Anthropic å®˜æ–¹ Skills ä»“åº“](https://github.com/anthropics/skills)æ”¹é€ è€Œæˆã€‚ æœ¬é¡¹ç›®å¯¹æ‰€æœ‰ 16 ä¸ªå®˜æ–¹ skills è¿›è¡Œäº†å®Œæ•´çš„ä¸­æ–‡åŒ–ï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬ï¼š - âœ… ç¿»è¯‘æ‰€æœ‰è¯´æ˜æ–‡æ¡£å’ŒæŒ‡ç¤ºå†…å®¹ - âœ… åœºæ™¯é€‚é…ï¼šå°†ç¤ºä¾‹è°ƒæ•´ä¸ºæ›´ç¬¦åˆä¸­æ–‡ç”¨æˆ·ä½¿ç”¨ä¹ æƒ¯ - âœ… æœ¯è¯­ç»Ÿä¸€ï¼šå»ºç«‹å®Œæ•´çš„ä¸­è‹±æ–‡æœ¯è¯­å¯¹ç…§è¡¨ - âœ… ä¿æŒåŠŸèƒ½å®Œæ•´æ€§ï¼šæ‰€æœ‰è„šæœ¬å’Œä»£ç ä¿æŒå¯æ‰§è¡Œæ€§ ### ğŸ”„ æ¨¡å‹é€‚é…è¯´æ˜ æœ¬é¡¹ç›®ä¸­çš„ skills é»˜è®¤æ˜¯ä¸º **Claude æ¨¡å‹**ç¼–å†™çš„ï¼Œæ–‡æ¡£ä¸­å¤šå¤„åŒ…å«"Claude"å­—æ ·ã€‚å¦‚æœæ‚¨æƒ³å°†è¿™äº› skills é€‚é…åˆ°å…¶ä»–å¤§è¯­è¨€æ¨¡å‹ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ä»¥ä¸‹å‘½ä»¤æ‰¹é‡æ›¿æ¢ï¼š #### macOS/Linux ç³»ç»Ÿï¼š ```bash # æ›¿æ¢æ‰€æœ‰ skills æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­çš„ "Claude" ä¸ºæ‚¨çš„æ¨¡å‹åç§° # æ³¨æ„ï¼šæ­¤å‘½ä»¤ä¼šåŒºåˆ†å¤§å°å†™ï¼Œç²¾ç¡®åŒ¹é… "Claude" find ./skills -type f \( -name "*.md" -o -name "*.py" -o -name "*.js" -o -name "*.html" \) \ -exec sed -i '' 's/Claude/[æ‚¨çš„å¤§æ¨¡å‹åç§°]/g' {} + # ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼šæ›¿æ¢ä¸º "GPT" find ./skills -type f \( -name "*.md" -o -name "*.py" -o -name "*.js" -o -name "*.html" \) \ -exec sed -i '' 's/Claude/GPT/g' {} + # ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼šæ›¿æ¢ä¸º "Qwen" find ./skills -type f \( -name "*.md" -o -name "*.py" -o -name "*.js" -o -name "*.html" \) \ -exec sed -i '' 's/Claude/Qwen/g' {} + ``` #### Windows ç³»ç»Ÿï¼ˆGit Bash æˆ– WSLï¼‰ï¼š ```bash # Windows ä¸‹ä½¿ç”¨ sedï¼ˆæ— éœ€ '' å‚æ•°ï¼‰ find ./skills -type f \( -name "*.md" -o -name "*.py" -o -name "*.js" -o -name "*.html" \) \ -exec sed -i 's/Claude/[æ‚¨çš„å¤§æ¨¡å‹åç§°]/g' {} + ``` #### å¤§å°å†™å˜ä½“å¤„ç†ï¼š å¦‚æœéœ€è¦åŒæ—¶æ›¿æ¢ä¸åŒå¤§å°å†™å½¢å¼ï¼ˆå¦‚ Claude, claude, CLAUDEï¼‰ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ä»¥ä¸‹å‘½ä»¤ï¼š ```bash # macOS/Linux - æ›¿æ¢æ‰€æœ‰å¤§å°å†™å˜ä½“ find ./skills -type f \( -name "*.md" -o -name "*.py" -o -name "*.js" -o -name "*.html" \) \ -exec sed -i '' -E 's/Claude|claude|CLAUDE/[æ‚¨çš„å¤§æ¨¡å‹åç§°]/g' {} + # Windows (Git Bash/WSL) find ./skills -type f \( -name "*.md" -o -name "*.py" -o -name "*.js" -o -name "*.html" \) \ -exec sed -i -E 's/Claude|claude|CLAUDE/[æ‚¨çš„å¤§æ¨¡å‹åç§°]/g' {} + ``` **âš ï¸ é‡è¦æç¤ºï¼š** 1. æ›¿æ¢å‰å»ºè®®å…ˆå¤‡ä»½æˆ–ä½¿ç”¨ Git ç‰ˆæœ¬æ§åˆ¶ 2. æ›¿æ¢åéœ€è¦æµ‹è¯•éªŒè¯åŠŸèƒ½æ˜¯å¦æ­£å¸¸ 3. æŸäº›æŠ€æœ¯æœ¯è¯­ï¼ˆå¦‚"Claude API"ï¼‰å¯èƒ½éœ€è¦æ‰‹åŠ¨è°ƒæ•´ 4. å»ºè®®å…ˆåœ¨å•ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šæµ‹è¯•å‘½ä»¤ï¼Œç¡®è®¤æ•ˆæœåå†æ‰¹é‡æ‰§è¡Œ ### ğŸ“‚ é¡¹ç›®ç»“æ„ ``` skills-zh/ â”œâ”€â”€ README.md # æœ¬æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆä¸­è‹±æ–‡åŒè¯­ï¼‰ â”œâ”€â”€ skills/ # æ‰€æœ‰ skillsï¼ˆå·²ä¸­æ–‡åŒ–ï¼‰ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ skill-creator/ # Skill åˆ›å»ºå·¥å…· â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ docx/ # Word æ–‡æ¡£ç”Ÿæˆ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ pdf/ # PDF æ–‡æ¡£ç”Ÿæˆ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ pptx/ # PowerPoint æ¼”ç¤ºæ–‡ç¨¿ç”Ÿæˆ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ xlsx/ # Excel è¡¨æ ¼ç”Ÿæˆ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ mcp-builder/ # MCP æœåŠ¡å™¨æ„å»º â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ webapp-testing/ # Web åº”ç”¨æµ‹è¯• â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ web-artifacts-builder/ # Web å·¥ä»¶æ„å»º â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ internal-comms/ # å†…éƒ¨æ²Ÿé€š â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ brand-guidelines/ # å“ç‰ŒæŒ‡å— â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ canvas-design/ # ç”»å¸ƒè®¾è®¡ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ theme-factory/ # ä¸»é¢˜å·¥å‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ slack-gif-creator/ # Slack GIF åˆ›å»º â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ algorithmic-art/ # ç®—æ³•è‰ºæœ¯ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ doc-coauthoring/ # æ–‡æ¡£å…±åŒæ’°å†™ â”‚ â””â”€â”€ frontend-design/ # å‰ç«¯è®¾è®¡ â”œâ”€â”€ spec/ # Agent Skills è§„èŒƒ â””â”€â”€ template/ # Skill æ¨¡æ¿ ``` ### ğŸ¯ Skill åˆ†ç±» #### ğŸ“„ æ–‡æ¡£ç±»å·¥å…· - **docx** - åˆ›å»ºæ ¼å¼åŒ–çš„ Word æ–‡æ¡£ - **pdf** - ç”Ÿæˆä¸“ä¸šçš„ PDF æ–‡æ¡£ - **pptx** - åˆ¶ä½œç²¾ç¾çš„ PowerPoint æ¼”ç¤ºæ–‡ç¨¿ - **xlsx** - åˆ›å»ºæ•°æ®ä¸°å¯Œçš„ Excel è¡¨æ ¼ - **doc-coauthoring** - ç»“æ„åŒ–æ–‡æ¡£å…±åŒæ’°å†™å·¥ä½œæµ #### ğŸ› ï¸ å¼€å‘å·¥å…·ç±» - **skill-creator** - åˆ›å»ºå’ŒéªŒè¯æ–° skills çš„å·¥å…· - **mcp-builder** - æ„å»º MCPï¼ˆModel Context Protocolï¼‰æœåŠ¡å™¨ - **webapp-testing** - Web åº”ç”¨è‡ªåŠ¨åŒ–æµ‹è¯• - **web-artifacts-builder** - Web å·¥ä»¶æ„å»ºå·¥å…· #### ğŸ¨ åˆ›æ„ä¸è®¾è®¡ç±» - **algorithmic-art** - ä½¿ç”¨ p5.js åˆ›å»ºç®—æ³•è‰ºæœ¯ - **canvas-design** - ç”»å¸ƒè®¾è®¡å·¥å…· - **frontend-design** - åˆ›å»ºé«˜è´¨é‡å‰ç«¯ç•Œé¢ - **theme-factory** - ä¸»é¢˜ç”Ÿæˆå·¥å‚ #### ğŸ’¼ ä¼ä¸šä¸æ²Ÿé€šç±» - **internal-comms** - å†…éƒ¨æ²Ÿé€šæ¶ˆæ¯ç”Ÿæˆ - **brand-guidelines** - å“ç‰ŒæŒ‡å—åº”ç”¨ - **slack-gif-creator** - ä¸º Slack åˆ›å»ºåŠ¨ç”» GIF ### ğŸš€ ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹æ³• #### æ–¹æ³• 1ï¼šåœ¨æ”¯æŒ Skills çš„å¹³å°ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨ å¦‚æœæ‚¨ä½¿ç”¨çš„ AI å¹³å°æ”¯æŒ Skills åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥å°† `skills/` ç›®å½•ä¸‹çš„ä»»ä½• skill æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ä¸Šä¼ ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚ #### æ–¹æ³• 2ï¼šä½œä¸ºæç¤ºè¯å‚è€ƒ å³ä½¿å¹³å°ä¸æ”¯æŒ Skillsï¼Œæ‚¨ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥å°† `SKILL.md` æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­çš„å†…å®¹ä½œä¸ºé«˜è´¨é‡æç¤ºè¯æ¨¡æ¿å‚è€ƒã€‚ #### æ–¹æ³• 3ï¼šä½¿ç”¨ skill-creator åˆ›å»ºè‡ªå®šä¹‰ Skill ```bash cd skills/skill-creator python3 scripts/init_skill.py # æŒ‰æç¤ºè¾“å…¥ skill åç§°å’Œæè¿° ``` ### ğŸ“š ç›¸å…³èµ„æº - **åŸé¡¹ç›®ä»“åº“**: [anthropics/skills](https://github.com/anthropics/skills) - **Agent Skills è§„èŒƒ**: [agentskills.io](http://agentskills.io) - **æœ¯è¯­å¯¹ç…§è¡¨**: è¯·å‚è€ƒå„ skill ä¸­çš„æ³¨é‡Šè¯´æ˜ ### âš–ï¸ è®¸å¯è¯ - å¤§éƒ¨åˆ† skills: Apache 2.0 å¼€æºè®¸å¯è¯ - æ–‡æ¡£ç±» skills (docx/pdf/pptx/xlsx): æºç å¯è§ä½†éå¼€æºï¼Œä»…ä¾›å‚è€ƒ - ä¸­æ–‡åŒ–æ”¹é€ å†…å®¹: éµå¾ªåŸé¡¹ç›®è®¸å¯è¯ ### ğŸ¤ è´¡çŒ® æ¬¢è¿æäº¤ Issue å’Œ Pull Request æ¥æ”¹è¿›ä¸­æ–‡åŒ–è´¨é‡æˆ–æ·»åŠ æ–°çš„ä¸­æ–‡ skillsã€‚ --- ## ğŸ“– About This Project This is a **Chinese-adapted version** of the Claude Skills repository, based on the [official Anthropic Skills repository](https://github.com/anthropics/skills). This project provides complete Chinese localization for all 16 official skills, including: - âœ… Translation of all documentation and instructions - âœ… Scenario adaptation: Examples adjusted for Chinese user habits - âœ… Terminology standardization: Complete Chinese-English terminology mapping - âœ… Maintained functionality: All scripts and code remain executable ### ğŸ”„ Model Adaptation Guide The skills in this project are written for **Claude** by default, with "Claude" mentioned throughout the documentation. If you want to adapt these skills for other large language models, use the following commands for batch replacement: #### macOS/Linux: ```bash # Replace "Claude" with your model name in all skills files # Note: This command is case-sensitive and matches "Claude" exactly find ./skills -type f \( -name "*.md" -o -name "*.py" -o -name "*.js" -o -name "*.html" \) \ -exec sed -i '' 's/Claude/[YourModelName]/g' {} + # Example: Replace with "GPT" find ./skills -type f \( -name "*.md" -o -name "*.py" -o -name "*.js" -o -name "*.html" \) \ -exec sed -i '' 's/Claude/GPT/g' {} + # Example: Replace with "Qwen" find ./skills -type f \( -name "*.md" -o -name "*.py" -o -name "*.js" -o -name "*.html" \) \ -exec sed -i '' 's/Claude/Qwen/g' {} + ``` #### Windows (Git Bash or WSL): ```bash # Windows sed (no '' parameter needed) find ./skills -type f \( -name "*.md" -o -name "*.py" -o -name "*.js" -o -name "*.html" \) \ -exec sed -i 's/Claude/[YourModelName]/g' {} + ``` #### Case Variant Handling: To replace different case variants simultaneously (Claude, claude, CLAUDE): ```bash # macOS/Linux - Replace all case variants find ./skills -type f \( -name "*.md" -o -name "*.py" -o -name "*.js" -o -name "*.html" \) \ -exec sed -i '' -E 's/Claude|claude|CLAUDE/[YourModelName]/g' {} + # Windows (Git Bash/WSL) find ./skills -type f \( -name "*.md" -o -name "*.py" -o -name "*.js" -o -name "*.html" \) \ -exec sed -i -E 's/Claude|claude|CLAUDE/[YourModelName]/g' {} + ``` **âš ï¸ Important Notes:** 1. Backup or use Git version control before replacement 2. Test functionality after replacement 3. Some technical terms (e.g., "Claude API") may need manual adjustment 4. Test the command on a single file first before batch execution ### ğŸ“‚ Project Structure ``` skills-zh/ â”œâ”€â”€ README.md # This file (bilingual) â”œâ”€â”€ skills/ # All skills (Chinese localized) â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ skill-creator/ # Skill creation tool â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ docx/ # Word document generation â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ pdf/ # PDF document generation â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ pptx/ # PowerPoint presentation generation â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ xlsx/ # Excel spreadsheet generation â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ mcp-builder/ # MCP server builder â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ webapp-testing/ # Web application testing â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ web-artifacts-builder/ # Web artifact builder â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ internal-comms/ # Internal communications â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ brand-guidelines/ # Brand guidelines â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ canvas-design/ # Canvas design â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ theme-factory/ # Theme factory â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ slack-gif-creator/ # Slack GIF creator â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ algorithmic-art/ # Algorithmic art â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ doc-coauthoring/ # Document co-authoring â”‚ â””â”€â”€ frontend-design/ # Frontend design â”œâ”€â”€ spec/ # Agent Skills specification â””â”€â”€ template/ # Skill template ``` ### ğŸ¯ Skill Categories #### ğŸ“„ Document Tools - **docx** - Create formatted Word documents - **pdf** - Generate professional PDF documents - **pptx** - Create beautiful PowerPoint presentations - **xlsx** - Create data-rich Excel spreadsheets - **doc-coauthoring** - Structured document co-authoring workflow #### ğŸ› ï¸ Development Tools - **skill-creator** - Tool for creating and validating new skills - **mcp-builder** - Build MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers - **webapp-testing** - Web application automated testing - **web-artifacts-builder** - Web artifact builder #### ğŸ¨ Creative & Design - **algorithmic-art** - Create algorithmic art using p5.js - **canvas-design** - Canvas design tool - **frontend-design** - Create high-quality frontend interfaces - **theme-factory** - Theme generation factory #### ğŸ’¼ Enterprise & Communication - **internal-comms** - Internal communication message generation - **brand-guidelines** - Brand guidelines application - **slack-gif-creator** - Create animated GIFs for Slack ### ğŸš€ Usage #### Method 1: Use in Skills-Enabled Platforms If your AI platform supports Skills, you can upload any skill folder from `skills/` directory directly. #### Method 2: As Prompt Reference Even if your platform doesn't support Skills, you can use the content in `SKILL.md` files as high-quality prompt templates. #### Method 3: Create Custom Skills with skill-creator ```bash cd skills/skill-creator python3 scripts/init_skill.py # Follow prompts to enter skill name and description ``` ### ğŸ“š Resources - **Original Repository**: [anthropics/skills](https://github.com/anthropics/skills) - **Agent Skills Specification**: [agentskills.io](http://agentskills.io) - **Terminology Reference**: See comments in individual skills ### âš–ï¸ License - Most skills: Apache 2.0 open source license - Document skills (docx/pdf/pptx/xlsx): Source-available but not open source, for reference only - Chinese localization: Follows original project license ### ğŸ¤ Contributing Issues and Pull Requests are welcome to improve Chinese localization quality or add new Chinese skills. --- ## ğŸŒŸ Star History If you find this project helpful, please consider giving it a star! â­ --- **é¡¹ç›®çŠ¶æ€ | Project Status**: âœ… å·²å®Œæˆä¸­æ–‡åŒ– | Chinese Localization Complete **æœ€åæ›´æ–° | Last Update**: 2026-01-22
